title: "Data Rights in Artificial Intelligence: Who Will Own Skynet?"
excerpt: "With arms races among global powers, the United States seeks to enter into contracts for machine learning artificial intelligence (AI) for its military. Neither current FAR provisions nor other sources of IP law properly consider IP rights."
